extension.name: System - Perfect Joomla! 3 User Interface and jQuery Includer
extension.author: Piotr MoÄ‡ko
extension.copyright: Copyright (C) 2016 Perfect Web sp. z o.o., All rights reserved.
extension.description: This plugin includes Joomla! 3 User Interface libraries with jQuery 1.11.2, jQuery UI 1.9.2, jQuery Migrate 1.2.1, Bootstrap 2.3.2, IcoMoon, LESS, JHttp and others. Also it can remove other instances of jQuery and include only one.

field.name: load_jhttp
field.label: Load fixed JHttp
field.description: Load always fixed JHttp Transport objects with option to disable verify peer

field.name: verify_peer
field.label: Verify peer on HTTP requests
field.description: Enable peer verification when making HTTP requests with JHttp object

field.name: load_jquery
field.label: Load jQuery
field.description: jQuery would be loaded for all pages

field.name: load_jquery_ui
field.label: Load jQuery UI
field.description: jQuery UI would be loaded for all pages

field.name: load_bootstrap_js
field.label: Load Bootstrap JS
field.description: Bootstrap JavaScript would be loaded for all pages

field.name: load_bootstrap_css
field.label: Load Bootstrap CSS
field.description: Bootstrap CSS would be loaded for all pages

field.name: remove_jquery
field.label: Remove other jQuery
field.description: Removes multiple files with jQuery to prevent JavaScript conflicts. All Joomla native files from directory media/jui/js/ will not be removed. jQuery files to be removed: jquery.js, jquery.min.js, jquery-latest.js, jquery-latest.min.js, jquery-x.x.x.js, jquery-x.x.x.min.js

field.name: remove
field.label: Remove below files
field.description: Removes all unnecesary JavaScript files which can not be disabled in extension configuration.

field.name: remove_includes
field.label: JavaScript files to remove on Desktop
field.description: List of JavaScript files to be removed on Desktop browsers. Separate files with coma. All Joomla native files from directory media/jui/js/ and media/system/js/ will not be removed.

field.name: remove_mobile_includes
field.label: JavaScript files to remove on Mobile
field.description: List of JavaScript files to be removed on Mobile browsers. Separate files with coma. All Joomla native files from directory media/jui/js/ and media/system/js/ will not be removed.
